chapter.title: Release Planning Tip - Use the Grid View
chapter.p: Use aggregations in column headings in the grid view to help with release planning.
Check out this video to see how to do iteration planning.

steps.item: Set up your project structure using card trees to define relationships among your project's various card types. (Check out this new how-to video for extra help.)
Create stories and assign estimates for them using card properties.
On the grid view, group cards by iteration and color by priority.
Select to view sum of estimate for every lane / iteration.
By dragging and dropping cards across iterations you can view the change in total size of every iteration in the lane heading.
